thread.title: BRIEF-ForeScout Technologies Posts Q4 Non-GAAP Loss Per Share $0.20

title: BRIEF-ForeScout Technologies Posts Q4 Non-GAAP Loss Per Share $0.20
text:
53 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-ForeScout Technologies Posts Q4 Non-GAAP Loss Per Share $0.20 Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - ForeScout Technologies Inc: 
* FORESCOUT TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.20 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $1.80 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $53.5 MILLION TO $56.5 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE UP 24 PERCENT * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 33 PERCENT TO $66 MILLION 
* SEES FOR Q1 OF 2018, FORESCOUT EXPECTS NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE OF $0.46 TO $0.44 
* FORESCOUT TECHNOLOGIES - FOR 2018, FORESCOUT EXPECTS REVENUE OF $260 MILLION TO $270 MILLION 
* FOR FULL YEAR OF 2018, FORESCOUT EXPECTS NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE OF $1.21 TO $1.13 
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.45, REVENUE VIEW $55.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-1.18, REVENUE VIEW $261.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.36, REVENUE VIEW $62.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
